pe3:2.1: Lobhādhiṭṭhānaṃ dosādhiṭṭhānaṃ mohādhiṭṭhānaṃ alobhādhiṭṭhānaṃ adosādhiṭṭhānaṃ amohādhiṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammādhiṭṭhānaṃ vācākammādhiṭṭhānaṃ manokammādhiṭṭhānaṃ saddhindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ vīriyindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ satindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ samādhindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ paññindriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
pe3:5.4: Esa gāḷhaṃ karoti bandhananti rāgaṃ, iti yo yo dhammo mūlanikkhitto, so yevettha dhammo uggāvahitabbo.
pe3:5.5: Na bhagavā ekaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha aññaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
pe3:5.6: Yassa vitakketi kāmavitakko tameva vitakkaṃ kāmavitakkena niddisīyati.
pe3:5.8: Subhānupassino bhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhatīti tameva rāgaṃ kāmataṇhāti niddisati.
pe3:5.9: Esa gāḷhaṃ karoti bandhananti tameva taṇhāsaṃyojanaṃ niddisati.
pe3:6.1: Tattha bhagavā ekaṃ dhammaṃ tividhaṃ niddisati, nissandato hetuto phalato.
pe3:8.1: Dadanti yaṃ yaṃ dānaṃ, idaṃ dānamayikaṃ puññakriyaṃ.
pe3:8.4: Bhajanti naṃ bahū, kittinti yo ca kalyāṇo kittisaddo loke abbhuggacchati, yaṃ bahukassa janassa piyo bhavati manāpo ca.
pe3:8.5: Yañca avippaṭisārī kālaṃ karoti ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:8.6: Yaṃ kāyassa bhedā devesu upapajjatīti idaṃ phalaṃ.
pe3:12.3: Surāmerayapānañca, yo naro anuyuñjatīti doso nidānaṃ.
pe3:12.4: Yo ca surāmerayapānaṃ anuyuñjati yathāparadāravihārī amittā janayanti.
pe3:13.1: Pañca verāni appahāyāti pañcannaṃ bhikkhāpadānaṃ samatikkamanaṃ sabbesaṃ dosajānaṃ sā paṇṇatti, teneva dosajanitena kammena dussīlo iti vuccati sopi dhammo hetunā niddisitabbo, nissandena phalena ca.
pe3:14.2: dubbhāsitabhāsī ca hoti, duccintitacintī ca dukkaṭakammakārī ca.
pe3:14.3: Tattha yaṃ kāyena ca vācāya ca parakkamati, idamassa dukkaṭakammakārī.
pe3:14.4: Tāyaṃ yathā ca musāvādaṃ bhāsati yathā pubbaniddiṭṭhaṃ, idamassa dubbhāsitā.
pe3:14.5: Yañca saṅkappeti manoduccaritaṃ byāpādaṃ, idamassa duccintitacintitā.
pe3:14.6: Yaṃ so imehi tīhi bālalakkhaṇehi samannāgato tīṇi tajjāni dukkhāni domanassāni anubhavati, so ca hoti sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā tajjaṃ kathaṃ kathanti.
pe3:14.7: Yadā bhavati so ca pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatho, so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti.
pe3:14.8: Puna caparaṃ yadā passati coraṃ rājāparādhikaṃ raññā gahitaṃ jīvitā voropetaṃ, tassevaṃ bhavati sace mamampi rājā jāneyya mamampi rājā gāhāpetvā jīvitā voropeyyāti, so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
pe3:14.9: Puna caparaṃ bālo yadā bhavati āsanā samārūḷho yāva yā me gati bhavissati ito pecca paraṃ maraṇāti so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti iti bālalakkhaṇaṃ hetu.
pe3:14.11: Kāyassa bhedā nirayesu upapajjati, idaṃ phalaṃ.
pe3:18.1: Yo yaṃ anamataggasaṃsāraṃ samāpanno jāyate ca mīyate ca, ayaṃ avijjāhetukā.
pe3:18.2: Yānipi ca saṅkhārānaṃ payojanāni, tānipi avijjāpaccayāni, yaṃ adassanaṃ buddhavacanassa, ayaṃ avijjāsutteyeva niddiṭṭhaṃ.
pe3:18.3: Yo ca saṅkhāre attato harati pañcakkhandhe pañca diṭṭhiyo upagacchati.
pe3:18.4: “Etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ avijjāya nikkhittaṃ, avijjāya nikkhipitaṃ.
pe3:18.5: Evaṃ satthā sutte nayena dhammena niddisati.
pe3:19.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā “idaṃ dukkhan”ti nappajānanti cattāri saccāni vitthārena, yaṃ tattha appajānanā, idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayaṃ hetu.
pe3:19.2: Appajānanto vividhe saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharoti, ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:19.3: Yañca diṭṭhigatāni parāmasati “idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:19.5: Ayampi dhammo saniddiṭṭho hetuto ca phalato ca nissandato ca.
pe3:20.1: Ettha pana keci dhammā sādhāraṇā bhavanti.
pe3:20.3: Yathā kiṃ bhave cattārimāni, bhikkhave, agatigamanāni.
pe3:20.4: Tattha yañca chandāgatiṃ gacchati yañca bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, ayaṃ lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
pe3:20.7: Evaṃ imāni tīṇi akusalamūlāni āditoyeva upaparikkhitabbāni.
pe3:20.8: Yattha ekaṃ niddisitabbaṃ, tattha ekaṃ niddisīyati.
pe3:20.9: Tathā dve yathā tīṇi, na hi ādīhi anikkhitte hetu vā nissando vā phalaṃ vā niddisitabbaṃ.
pe3:23.1: Kattha chandā ca ayaṃ lobho yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ pubbe.
pe3:26.1: Tattha yā asubhāya upaparikkhā, ayaṃ kāmesu ādīnavadassanena pariccāgo.
pe3:26.2: Indriyesu susaṃvuto tasseva alobhassa pāripūriyaṃ mama āyatanasocitaṃ anupādāya.
pe3:26.4: Iti ayaṃ alobho asubhānupassitāya vatthuto dhārayati, so alobho hetu.
pe3:26.5: Indriyesu guttadvāratāya gocarato dhārayati, bhojanemattaññutāya parato dhārayati, ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:26.6: Taṃ ve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃ va pabbatanti, idaṃ phalaṃ.
pe3:26.7: Iti yoyeva dhammo ādimhi nikkhitto, soyeva majjhe ceva avasāne ca.
pe3:27.1: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi asamuppannassa kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā pahānāya, yathayidaṃ asubhanimittaṃ.
pe3:27.2: Tattha asubhanimittaṃ manasikarontassa anuppanno ceva kāmacchando na uppajjati, uppanno ca kāmacchando pahīyati.
pe3:27.4: Yaṃ puna anuppanno kāmarāgo pariyādiyati rūparāgaṃ arūparāgaṃ, iti phalaṃ.
pe3:27.5: Iti ayampi ca dhammo niddiṭṭho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:30.1: Ekampi ce pāṇamaduṭṭhacitto mettāyatīti ayaṃ adoso.
pe3:30.2: Nigghātena assādo, kusalo tena hotīti tena kusalena dhammena saṃyutto dhammapaññattiṃ gacchati.
pe3:30.3: Kusaloti yathā paññāya pañño paṇḍiccena paṇḍito.
pe3:30.4: Pahūtamariyo pakaroti puññanti tassāyeva vipāko ayaṃ lokiyassa, na hi lokuttarassa.
pe3:30.7: Yāva abyāpajjo bhūmiyaṃ bahupuññaṃ pasavati, idaṃ phalaṃ.
pe3:30.8: Iti adoso niddiṭṭho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:31.2: Tattha yā mettācetovimutti, ayaṃ ariyadhammesu rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, lokikāya bhūmikā hetu, yaṃ sukhaṃ āyatiṃ manāpo hoti manussānaṃ, ime ekādasa dhammā nissando.
pe3:34.7: Iti amoho niddiṭṭho hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca.
pe3:35.1: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ.
pe3:35.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anabhisametassa dukkhassa ariyasaccassa abhisamayāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati, vīriyaṃ ārabhati, cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
pe3:35.6: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yā ca maggo, idaṃ aññindriyaṃ.
pe3:35.7: Āsavakkhayā anāsavo hoti, idaṃ vuccati aññātāvindriyaṃ.
pe3:35.9: Yaṃ chandaṃ janeti vāyamati, yā pajānāti, ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:35.10: Yena sabbaso āsavānaṃ khayā hetu, yaṃ khaye ñāṇamuppajjati, anuppāde ñāṇañca, ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:35.12: Tattha khīṇā me jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyanti, idaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ.
pe3:35.13: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmīti idaṃ anuppāde ñāṇaṃ.
pe3:35.14: Iti imāni indriyāni amoho niddiṭṭho hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca.
pe3:36.8: Yañca alobho tīṇi kammāni samuṭṭhāpeti saṅkappaṃ vāyāmaṃ samādhiñca, ayaṃ alobhassa nissando.
pe3:36.10: Yaṃ tayo dhamme paṭṭhapeti sammāvācaṃ sammākammantaṃ sammāājīvañca, ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:36.11: Tattha yo amoho hetu, yaṃ dve dhamme upaṭṭhapeti aviparītadassanampi ca anabhilāpanaṃ, ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:36.12: Imassa brahmacariyassa yaṃ phalaṃ, tā dve vimuttiyo rāgavirāgā cetovimutti avijjā virāgā ca paññāvimutti, idaṃ phalaṃ.
pe3:36.13: Iti imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni niddiṭṭhāni hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:39.2: Tattha ye saṅkhatā tulaṃ, te dve dhammā assādo ca ādīnavo ca tulitā bhavanti.
pe3:39.4: Ettako ādīnavo imassa, idaṃ nissaraṇanti iti nibbānaṃ pajānāti.
pe3:39.5: Dvīhi kāraṇehi atulaṃ na ca sakkā tulayituṃ.
pe3:39.6: Ettakaṃ etaṃ netaṃ paramatthīti tena atulaṃ.
pe3:39.7: Atha pāpuṇā ratanaṃ karitvā acchariyabhāvena atulaṃ.
pe3:39.8: Tattha kusalassa ca abhisambhavā jānanā passanā, ayaṃ amoho.
pe3:39.9: Yaṃ tattha ñātā osiraṇā bhavasaṅkhārānaṃ, ayaṃ alobho.
pe3:39.10: Yaṃ ajjhattarato samāhitoti vikkhepapaṭisaṃharaṇā, ayaṃ adoso.
pe3:39.13: Yo bhavasaṅkhārānaṃ samosaraṇaṃ lobho sammāsamādhīnaṃ assādo, ayaṃ hetu.
pe3:39.14: Yaṃ ajjhattarato avijjaṇḍakosaṃ sambhedo, ayaṃ nissando.
pe3:39.15: Sā pavatti imāni tīṇi niddiṭṭhāni kusalamūlāni hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
pe3:40.1: Ettāvatā esā pavatti ca nivatti ca akusalamūlehi pavattati, kusalamūlehi nivattatīti imehi ca tīhi sabbaṃ akusalamūlaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati.
pe3:40.2: So dhamme vā vacanato niddiṭṭho taṇhāti vā kodhoti vā asampajaññanti vā anusayoti vā makkhoti vā paḷāsoti vā assatīti vā issāti vā macchariyanti vā aññāṇanti vā, tehi ye ca vatthūhi niddisitabbaṃ.
pe3:40.3: Yassimāni dve vacanāni dhammapadāni niddiṭṭhāni na so atthi kilesā, yo imesu navasu padesu samodhānaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati.
pe3:40.4: Ayaṃ kileso, na ca lobho, na ca doso, na ca moho.
pe3:41.1: Yathā akusalamūlāni, evaṃ kusalāni paṭikkhepena niddisitabbāni.
